name: DisplayEntityHelper
description: The `DisplayEntityHelper` class is a specialized wrapper for Minecraft display entities (introduced in 1.19.4), providing access to display entity properties such as transformation, rendering settings, brightness, and visual effects. It serves as the base class for all display entity helpers and offers comprehensive methods for querying display entity information, positioning, interpolation states, and rendering properties.
overview: Display entities are special entities used to display blocks, items, or text in the world with advanced customization options for positioning, rotation, scaling, and visual effects. This class is typically obtained through entity-related events, world queries, or when specifically filtering for display entity types.

constructors.description: DisplayEntityHelper instances are not typically created directly by scripters. Instead, they are obtained through entity-related events (e.g., `EntitySpawn`, `EntityInteract`), world entity queries with display entity filtering, methods that return entities and can be cast to display entities, or entity type checking with `entity.is("minecraft:block_display", "minecraft:item_display", "minecraft:text_display")`.

methods.name: getLerpTargetX
methods.description: Gets the target X coordinate for display entity interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetY
methods.description: Gets the target Y coordinate for display entity interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetZ
methods.description: Gets the target Z coordinate for display entity interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetPitch
methods.description: Gets the target pitch (X-rotation) for display entity interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetYaw
methods.description: Gets the target yaw (Y-rotation) for display entity interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpProgress
methods.description: Gets the current interpolation progress (0.0 to 1.0) for the display entity's transformation.

parameters.name: partialTicks
parameters.description: The partial tick value used for interpolation.

methods.name: getBillboardMode
methods.description: Gets the billboard mode of the display entity (e.g., 'FIXED', 'VERTICAL', 'HORIZONTAL').

methods.name: getVisibilityBoundingBox
methods.description: Gets the visibility bounding box of the display entity.

methods.name: getViewRange
methods.description: Gets the maximum distance at which the display entity is visible.

methods.name: getDisplayWidth
methods.description: Gets the rendered width of the display entity.

methods.name: getDisplayHeight
methods.description: Gets the rendered height of the display entity.

methods.name: getBrightness
methods.description: Gets the overall brightness value (0-15) used for rendering the display entity.

methods.name: getSkyBrightness
methods.description: Gets the sky light component (0-15) of the display entity's brightness.

methods.name: getBlockBrightness
methods.description: Gets the block light component (0-15) of the display entity's brightness.

methods.name: getShadowRadius
methods.description: Gets the radius of the shadow cast by the display entity.

methods.name: getShadowStrength
methods.description: Gets the strength or opacity of the shadow cast by the display entity.

methods.name: getGlowColorOverride
methods.description: Gets the override glow color (ARGB integer) applied to the display entity, or 0 if none.
